item.ars_noita.ars_noita_staff.desc: A staff that allows temporal spellcasting with begin, tick, and end phases.
glyph.ars_noita.temporal_context_form.de: A form glyph that resolves based on the current staff phase context. Can only be used in staff Tick or End phases.
gui.ars_noita.staff.title: Ars Noita Staff Configuration
